article_title: Why Healthcare Costs Are About To Explode

article_metadata.description: (Photo credit: Images_of_Money) This post was contributed by Louis J. Goodman, PhD, Board member of the Physicians Foundation and Tim Norbeck, CEO of the Physicians Foundation. Word out of Washington is that Obamacare is finally fulfilling its promise to bend the nation’s healthcare cost curve. Unfortunately, it’s bending it the wrong way. Forty-one months after [...]
article_metadata.author: Walker Ray, MD and Tim Norbeck
